website_summaries.verdict: The blades may be expensive, but the shave is great and the low initial price is a pleasant surprise.
pros: Thin, five-blade system cuts through facial hair with no tugging and blades do last longer than you'd expect
cons: Expensive refills and a bit hard to find cheaper alternatives

customer_reviews.title: This company thinks men are toxic
customer_reviews.text: You have to love their recent commercial regarding male toxicity. I wrote to them, but have received neither a response from them nor their parent company Proctor & Gamble. I will never use a Gillette product again. Interestingly, this is the very company that used to feature scantily glad women sporting the word "Gillette" on the back of their very brief bottoms. Attacking their very customers - very interesting and distressing and more than a stupid business decision.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I think the amazon price is better than the grocery store or drug store price, as well. I shave my legs every day--a habit developed living in South Florida for college--so I need to invest in a good razor. I cannot use the cheap disposables as they cut my legs, resulting in blood, a mess, and scars. No one wants that. So I think it's important to invest in a more expensive razor. That being said, the price is great. This shaves smoothly and easily, gliding over my legs well. I would recommend this product to a friend. Is it pink and girls? No. But, it works well and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Erika

customer_reviews.title: nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely designed razor, but it lacks functionality. I had to make multiple passes when shaving and still wasn't smooth. You cannot touch the head to guide the razor because of the exposed razor backs. Since the head does not flex back, going over curves is risky. My skin didn't like something in the strip and broke out. Also did not come with advertised refills, not that I will be using them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: mumei

customer_reviews.title: Look no more!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best razor I have ever bought, if not the best. I'm not exaggerating when I say it is smooth and sharp fresh out of the box. One of the pros is that it comes with an extra blade replacement. The ball that the razor has also makes it very easy to shave your neck. The blades also last a pretty long time if you shave everyday. Mine last about 2 weeks give or take. - Pros: -Price -Sharp -Smooth close shave -Replacement blades _ Cons: -None
customer_reviews.author: Victor Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for pubic area, cuts clean and stays smooth for longer
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this razor for abt a month, im a girl who uses it to tidy up post brazilian wax cause i dont want to pay so much every month. For such a sensitive area ive had the best success with this razor. I moisturize with tea tree and coconut oil after shaving to prevent ingrowns and have been able to achieve nice smoothness. Hair doesnt grow back fast and ive had very minimal problems with ingrowns or cuts (never cut myself yet)- definitely better than my titanium sheik quatro! (The blades are much more sharp and the area stays smooth longer)
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves this razor. It is the only one (and we have tried may brands) of razor that shaves his head and face as smooth as a baby's bottom. We tried Dollar Shave Club but he kept getting knicked more than getting the perfect shave and many other brands of razors just leave him with so much stubble that he itches. We are very pleased with this product and as soon as he needs more blades we will be joining the Amazon Subscription Service so that they get delivered right to our mailbox so that he never has to go a day without the perfect shave.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Smoothest shave ever.
customer_reviews.text: This probably the best razor I have ever used. I was first introduced to this razor by a friend and I am hooked. The blades are a bit pricey, but that is the case with any of these kind of models. It is well worth it though. The smoothest shave ever. I even tried using a straight razor with not much success. This is the one I'm hooked on. The blades last a while which makes the price of them not so bad in the end. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M

customer_reviews.title: Description is a lie
customer_reviews.text: Description literally says you get "Gillette Fusion Proglide Men's Razor With Flexball Handle Technology" AND "2 Razor Blade Refills". There is no way to interpret this but that there are 3 razors in the package (1 + 2 = 3, due to the "and"). However, only 2 razors are in the package total. Are they trying to imply that the initial "razor" in the description is merely the handle? Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: A Great Razor that does it's job right.
customer_reviews.text: A great razor at a good price! I bought this Razor because I used to buy the cheap ones and noticed that they did not work well for me or did not have much of a comfortable shave for me. I then found the Gillette Fusion Proglide Razor and it rocks. Clean nice feeling shave and it just works. Overall: If you don't like the cheap guys, this is your next Razor! Would defiantly recommend as I love it and would also love you to love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: VS2929

customer_reviews.title: Beats shave club razors handily!
customer_reviews.text: I was always a Mach 1 guy but was swayed to try a "razor club" that shall remain nameless. The blades they provided although cheaper and changed with great frequency were far inferior to those from Gillette. We made the move back and Wow, these are better in every single way. I truly believe that using a high quality razor is actually cheaper than the save clubs because the frequency of blade change is significantly less than with something like the Gillette Fusion.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: My 76 Year Old Dad Says: "Best Shave I've Ever Had!"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Dad, and he LOVES it! He said it's the best shave he's ever had... Smooth, and shaves well. What else needs to be said?? My Dad is 76 - so obviously, he's been shaving for a long time.. I chose not to purchase the "battery operated" razor, as my Dad is old school - and likes a good razor. So - if he says he loves it - then 5 Stars it is!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeIsMe!

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I can say. Best razor I have used. Shaves very smooth. The one downside is that the vibration is less than the standard power fusion (without the proglide). So for those that had the first power version, its slower to shave (noticeably). The original vibrated more forcibly which made shaving a few days growth very quick. This is fairly fast but not as quick as its predecessor but shaves better as it hugs the skin great (but I have a smooth/round face so its pretty easy for me anyway).
customer_reviews.author: M. Franks

customer_reviews.title: Ball Head Review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Fusion for years now and it was time for a new handle. I saw this ball headed handle and thought "ok it makes sense." The idea of the ball head is nice but this does not shave any better than my old Fusion without the ball head. If you need a new handle, then go for it, otherwise; if you are thinking of getting a new handle because of the ball head, then wait for something better to make the jump. I rate it 5 stars because it does the job as well as the old Fusion.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth over the skin
customer_reviews.text: After 4 decades of using an electric razor - Norelco, Braun - I switched to this razor. I was sick and tired of the mediocre performance of electrics a few months after replacing the heads. The heads are $$$$. One pass is all it takes to shave with this razor. Super smooth over the skin. Great results even in difficult areas. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R3

customer_reviews.title: This is now my favorite razor
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I thought the ball was a bit gimmicky. Now that I been using it, I actually think it makes the shave more comfortable. I would give 5 stars if the base was better. The base only covers the top part of the razor and it does not stand-up which means it takes up more space on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Dingfield

customer_reviews.title: Love the shave!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a add on item. Good price, nice close shave. I shave my head and this razors makes quick work of the process. Refills are pricey. I thought this was another one of the battery operated ones that vibrates, it is not. I believe the claim tomfame for this razor is the range of motion as the razor pivots left to right. Really good shave, I just wish refills were more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: luckyfind27

customer_reviews.title: Decent Razor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent razor to be honest and gets decent shave. This is very similar to the kind of shave I get it from Mach 3 razors in the past. I am happy and have ordered set of blades for it as well. The other positive things about the blade is that they last almost a 1 month without going bad (2-3 shaves a week).
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bloke

customer_reviews.title: great product from Gillette
customer_reviews.text: I only use disposable razors because the only place that i grow facial hair is my mustache and chin. I thought id give myself a better shave by treating myself with higher quality razors for my facial hair. Glides like butter. Really easy to use. No more rashes due to cheap metal razors. Id recommend this razor to people with little to lots of facial hair. Your face will thank you later after.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!
customer_reviews.text: This razor is not nearly as good as the Mach 3! The blades are much thinner -- too thin to cut evenly. They can hang, and cut into the face very easily. I would recommend that you try the Mach 3 instead by Gillette.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: For us lady's too!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome razor for women, not just for men. I hate buying women's razors because they don't last. The blades on mine keep going for months. I don't have thick hair, so I believe that's the reason. I also love how it slides to every corner and angle. It gives me a very smooth shave without irritating my skin.
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: it's comfortable and work well
customer_reviews.text: In general, it's comfortable and work well. The handle and blade are beautiful. But the flexball part disappoints me. In the opposition to the shiny handle, it has a bumpy plastic surface and blunt edge making it looks like a cheep. Orange button has a squiggly black circle. the button is loose and it makes a gap with the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Trong N.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you with a babyface feel
customer_reviews.text: Buying disposable razors for the last year I found myself having to be super careful shaving and they would dull out after a few shaves. They never left that babyface feeling. With the gilette fusion it feels like a comfortable shave and leaves you feeling clean
customer_reviews.author: J Wurm

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic razor. It's marketed for men, but it's the best razor this woman has ever owned. The extra blades give me an extra close shave without any skin irritation, and the pivoting head is great for avoiding nicks on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Finally!..  another major improvement to the razor
customer_reviews.text: A razor is a razor. Well that was until the mach 3 came out. But since then it's been kinda slow in the development department. Until now. I thought the ball was a neat gimmick. Copy design cues off of an overly priced vacuum company. But I have to admit. It works. It is now almost impossible to miss spots. It is now the greatest improvement in modern shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Shook

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is amazing! I'm a woman and I have always preferred men's shavers, they seem to get a closer shave. This particular shaver has kept it's edge longer than any other shaver I've used. I have to admit I keep my shavers longer than I should lol. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: SamIAm

customer_reviews.title: Too big with Five blades
customer_reviews.text: meh! Five blades work very well on the larger area of my cheeks and neck, but creates too large of a platform to get around the tight spots such as under the nose. So I end up using my old twin blade as well. Does not make since keeping two razors in the shower, so I donated this one to my Wife and her hairy legs!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyc

customer_reviews.title: After only 4 or 5 shaves the blades sitll work but start to feel like they are pulling out the hair by the roots
customer_reviews.text: Was beleiveing the TV ads that tout how smooth and long lasting the blades are.... according to the ads the blades last for weeks. I have the same experiance using two new blades now..... After only 4 or 5 shaves the blades sitll work but start to feel like they are pulling out the hair by the roots. Not smooth shaving at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a hard time shaving above my upper lip. The skin is very tender. The Proglide works pretty well for this, but for general shaving I would much rather use a Gillette Guard razor (a single edge cartridge razor made in India). In fact I haven't bothered using the Fusion Proglide since the 1st week I've had it. The razor's okay, but there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Richrol

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor is a must for the person that wants a close shave. The blades are expensive, but I put my razor in a cup of baby oil after use and can get a month of great shaving by doing this.. I use the fusion gel which awesome. I warm up the gel in a large cup of hot water which feels better when I apply it too my face.
customer_reviews.author: jay ponce

customer_reviews.title: The best technology has to offer in a shave (for now)
customer_reviews.text: Honestly.....I wanted to hate this razor. I mean, a ball? Has someone finally jumped the shark in the razor wars? But after using it for a week or so....I have to say no, it is a real solid improvement over existing razor technology. Until there is an iPhone app for shaving...I will stick with this.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a gimmick but OK shave.
customer_reviews.text: The razor is cheap in price and where they make the money is on the blades you will need. They are pricey!! It shaves ok but not that much better than a disposable IMO. The swivel is kind of a gimmick. BTW it does not tell you how to replace the blades but push the yellow button to release the blade assembly.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Best razor for silky smooth legs!
customer_reviews.text: It's and Ok far better tan any other leg razor on the market but It costs way to much for a reusable stick especially considering the outrageous prices of blades.
customer_reviews.author: JessieTop Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Not Just For The Boys
customer_reviews.text: I decided to bow to marketing pressure and get one of these. I rolled my eyes at the revolutionary-flavored ads, but I figured the most I could lose was a few bucks. I'm so glad I did! I get a smooth shave over all the curvy bits -- "men's" razor, puh-leeze -- because that little pivot ball really pivots. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Portlander

customer_reviews.title: Great shave!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blade!! Tried shaving club but had a lot of nicks despite fresh blades and what not. None of that with Gillette.. Blades last me a month and get a perfect tight shave every time.. You get what you pay for I guess..
customer_reviews.author: Goran T

customer_reviews.title: These are definately the better razor on the market
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these razors, and has used them this brand for over 12 years. These are so expensive in stores, but this was priced appropriately I think. These are definately the better razor on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Romero

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my neck
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this razor irritated under my neck, this does not happen with disposables will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: summer2013

customer_reviews.title: My neck, my back, shave my.... And my crack.
customer_reviews.text: Shave it now, shave it good, shave this... Just like you should.. This is the best razor I have ever used. It doesn't clog, my skin is smooth and honestly it lasts. Most razor only last one or two shaves for me but this one is going strong. Buy it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Gasser

customer_reviews.title: Another solid product from Gillette.
customer_reviews.text: The overall construction is solid. Razor has a nice heft. The adjustable shaving head is comfortable. It easily glides over the face. I replaced my older Fusion cause I had a few extra bucks on a gift card. Not a giant leap up in innovation from Fusion razor but worth the extra bucks. I shave everyday and 1 blade lasts a month.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of the Gillette fusion but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the Gillette fusion but I ordered this razor on here and every time I use it I cut myself. The razor blades are just kind of ragged and don't feel brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Libbie

customer_reviews.title: A very excellent product and brand
customer_reviews.text: Gillette what to say? A very excellent product and brand.of premium popularity! It never lets me down and shaves to pure perfection! I can always get a cool handsome look from using it! Always on my list for replacements​ when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: I’m a loyal Gillette Fusion ProGlide WOMAN customer!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite razors. I’m a woman and these work better than any female marketed razors ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Angelette

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I feel the blades are good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I feel the blades are good quality, not the best but pretty good, with good price. One complaint is I think the description is a little deceptive. They say "2 refills." To me this mean you get an initial razor blade with two spare blades. However you only get 2 total blades with this product. To me that's like selling somebody a soda and saying it comes with one free refill. Then when they ask for a refill they're told they just drank it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Sun

customer_reviews.title: Spend $10 to Try This Once
customer_reviews.text: Simply put - this is state-of-the-art shaving. If you haven't tried it, spend $10 to experience the pleasure the rest of us know. The blades are smooth magic, and the FlexBall is technology not available anywhere else. Just try it once.
customer_reviews.author: 80s Product

customer_reviews.title: This Shaver is the Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This Shaver is the Best I have ever used. I have VERY sensitive skin and can only shave once every 5 days , which gives me that Hobo look around day 4. Whith this shaver , I can shave every 2 days and it cuts Beautifully. Smoothest shave Ever !!
customer_reviews.author: Richee

customer_reviews.title: Not a close shave
customer_reviews.text: Had to go over and over same area- Hydro 3 is so much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hemming

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different razors in the past few years and the Gillette Fusion Proglide is top notch. The blades stay very sharp and I get an incredibly close and smooth shave!
customer_reviews.author: GaTrapper

customer_reviews.title: Great shave.
customer_reviews.text: Gave up DSC for this superior shave. DSC blades have gone downhill the last several months, so I'm giving this a try. Blades seem to last almost two weeks and are easily sourced here at a fair price
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Shaving becomes more fun - I shave against  the grain, better than battery powered Gillette Fusion Proglide
customer_reviews.text: comparing this one to battery powered Gillette Fusion Proglide  it's way better! it's smoother and not painful at all. I like to go shave against the grain simply because it's cleaner, my face is white but my hair is black.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but nice
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best razor I have had. The shave is smooth and substantially less painful. Only negative point is the cost...blades are quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Samsung

customer_reviews.title: Good Product! I can see the difference!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I have been through the era of twin blades to Mach3 to Mach3 turbo to fusion to proglide and now flexball.. but you know what, I can see the difference. Very good product. I like it. One star was omitted for the blue lotion strip that quickly disappears after a 2-3 shaves..
customer_reviews.author: FrankT-CA

customer_reviews.title: I liked the older ones better
customer_reviews.text: They keep trying to upgrade this product and make changes. I liked the older ones better.
customer_reviews.author: robert sellons

customer_reviews.title: My favorite razor.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different razors, but I always end up back to the Gillette 5 blade razor. It really is the best I've used even if the blades are a little more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kwinfl

customer_reviews.title: ... using this model since it first came out and love it. I really like the way it contours ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this model since it first came out and love it. I really like the way it contours around my neck so that I am not constantly getting little cuts.
customer_reviews.author: RittZula

customer_reviews.title: Very good blades. They last a long time if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good blades. They last a long time if you dip them in alcohol after rinsing them well. And then, when dry, rub against denim 20 or 30 times the opposite direction you shave with the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Flynn

customer_reviews.title: I am a sucker for new razor technology
customer_reviews.text: Shaving is a pain, so anything helps. This new razor gives me a much close shave - in fact so close for the first few days, it was a bit much. Now my skin is used to it and I am really enjoying the closer shave. I get no 5 o'clock shadow with this razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: The price was better here.
customer_reviews.text: The price was better here...than any store I've found. But...the new design isnt anything incredible. I shave every day...and have tried many different razors. It is just like a normal Fusion. The new ball system isnt anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Keifers

customer_reviews.title: Woman razors suck! I used my boyfriends once (probably not smart ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman and I loveeeee this razor. It's the only kind that makes my legs feel silky smooth! Woman razors suck! I used my boyfriends once (probably not smart lol) but I'll never use a woman's razor ever again haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor I have Used!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best razor I have ever used. I shave my head and face and it now takes a quarter of the time to do the shave. The blades glide very smoothly. I highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: I'd heard good things about using men's razors
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard good things about using men's razors, but I had horrible luck cutting up my legs with them. This one, however, is great! Really close shave that doesn't irritate my legs, and it never slices me up.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Affordable and durable. Shaves very close and leaves my legs smooth
customer_reviews.author: Shahnoza Holboeva

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy, great price.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. He says it doesn't pull or cause irritation. He has a scar on his face, and he says it goes over nicely (unlike some razors).
customer_reviews.author: Bg

customer_reviews.title: My beard sucks. Many barbers have told me so
customer_reviews.text: My beard sucks. Many barbers have told me so. This razor works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: NetPurchaseMan

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY the best shave every
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the hype, but now I'm a believer. ABSOLUTELY the best shave every. It has been over a month and I have not cut my face once...not even a nick. Blades are great and long lasting. (1) blade a month and 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: amazonimous

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It works well and seems to be easy on my bald head. The KEY is an EXCELLENT shave gel. I ONLY use Aveeno Therapeutic Shave Gel. Simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nosloptrainman

customer_reviews.title: Razor Review
customer_reviews.text: Works like it is supposed to. Higher quality razor. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: meyer123

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have no comparison with better items. The movement of the raiser helps for going around the curvy natural shape of the body. I am happy with it and bought it again. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Earth: I mean IT

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Great razor, the five blades really help in preventing razor burn.
customer_reviews.author: tuga_1

customer_reviews.title: Great new design.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The swivel design is slick and makes shaving easier as there is more control. Although I suspect the blades are what makes this razor stand out from competition, the weight of the handle makes shaving feel more luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a little better than the last model
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Fusion for years and years. It's definitely a little better than the last model, although I always hate myself for buying each new generation. At least they didn't add another 5 blades to the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: The razor does a great job at getting a close shave and rotating around ...
customer_reviews.text: This razor is my very first razor that I have bought. The razor does a great job at getting a close shave and rotating around bends and curves. I highly recommend this along with the Gillette Fusion Proglide Clear Shaving Gel.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: razors are always overpriced, but this one works well, the replacement blades are expensive
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nifty razor so far the first few shaves
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nifty razor so far the first few shaves. Though these blades dull quick the first few shaves with new ones are the best shave plus the swivle head helps.
customer_reviews.author: anthony j

customer_reviews.title: but it is a good razor and works well and most
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. I thought it would be just another gimmick to buy more expensive razor blades, but it is a good razor and works well and most, if not all fusion blades fit it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive cartriges
customer_reviews.text: As usual this Gillete razor is very good and the starter's set price is fantastic....the downside is that the cartrigers are rididicously expensive. The flexball is handy but not the ultimate in shaving razors design.
customer_reviews.author: Elias B. Merkins

customer_reviews.title: I should have stuck with the Mach 3
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my particular razor was defective, or something, but it was horribly dull. I bought this because it was a bit cheaper than the mach 3s (which I've had a for a very long time; always satisfied with performance) and I regretted it immediately. Using a scaly fish would offer a better shave!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband just got these after using his dad's...guess he likes them!
customer_reviews.author: my3kids

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: The retail version has a complete set of refil razors with it...however this had one refil...three were missing. Great razor however i feel kind of ripped off knowing they took some refil razors out. Great razor...buy in person from a store to get the full value
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dart

customer_reviews.title: Good product with misleading/deceiving description.
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it 5 stars because it is a very fine razor blade. However I am giving it 3 stars because I believe they are intentionally deceiving/misleading customers, claiming that it comes with two refills. I expect to receive one blade on the handle, and two "refills." However there is only one blade other than the on on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: samson

customer_reviews.title: Best razor I ever owned in my 30 yrs of ...
customer_reviews.text: Best razor I ever owned in my 30 yrs of shaving experience. I recommend this to anyone who gets rashes from electric shavers. As close shave as it will ever get unless skin comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Zuesss

customer_reviews.title: Works Great But it is Still Shaving.
customer_reviews.text: Shaving is still a chore. i wish I didn't have to do it. None the less I have never had a better razor then the Gillette Fusion.
customer_reviews.author: James Briggs

customer_reviews.title: gotta shave everyday!
customer_reviews.text: haven't use a good razor for so long. the moment i shave with it, i am never going back to those cheap ones from hotel. thank god i bought this
customer_reviews.author: C Money

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this brand is not in doubt, as always lived up to my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya

customer_reviews.title: A little cheaper than the store
customer_reviews.text: These thing are usually too overpriced to even consider buying. With Amazon it is at least more manageable. It is a high quality razor.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It isn't going to change your life with the flexball ...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't going to change your life with the flexball. It's just a handle in my opinion. Stick with your old gillette proglide razor and just replace the heads.
customer_reviews.author: rpunya

customer_reviews.title: Not overly technology improved
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my powered gillette, it really does not offer much more in it's swivel feature that for me I still prefer my old version however as it uses the same blades it makes a good back-up
customer_reviews.author: Scotsman

customer_reviews.title: He needs to shave so why not give him some help
customer_reviews.text: He needs to shave so why not give him some help. This Razor is great
customer_reviews.author: KDH

customer_reviews.title: I'm Bald
customer_reviews.text: I'm balding so I shave my head with this. Awesome. Blades good for 2 months with "Jean Sharpening." And it comes with coupons for blades. Overall great.
customer_reviews.author: MeetJinKim

customer_reviews.title: Gillette blades nice shave, but short blade life for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Fusion Proglide blades give good shave, three times. Obvious whisker pull thereafter considering the market cost.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK R. GIARDINO

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave
customer_reviews.text: Sharpest, smoothest shave yet. Not sure if it's the rotating head or the blades, but it shaves really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Gillette Fusion Razor
customer_reviews.text: It's a razor and it works well but like every other brand, too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Woyaya

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive but not good
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this because it looks cool and is intuitive. However, these lasted the shortest of any razor I've ever had and in addition to that gave me a bit of a rash and cut a few times. With higher quality razors this would be more than just a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: David Schnitzer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing razor. I have a very thick beard and this doesn't pull at all when shaving. It glides across the skin. Would absolutely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Ziadeh

customer_reviews.title: I always use the blades for much longer than recommended and it hardly lessen shave quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. I always use the blades for much longer than recommended and it hardly lessen shave quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nisan C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: been months and still using this product, clean shave every time
customer_reviews.author: Gene Yuss

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with my purchase. The Gillette razor arrived as described by the Seller and it arrived ahead of schedule. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Eng

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with my purchase. The Gillette razor arrived as described by the Seller and it arrived ahead of schedule. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best razor I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Womens razors are awful compared to this. Easily the best razor I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Also thanks four fast
customer_reviews.text: No comment needed. It's great! Also thanks four fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: daonkim

customer_reviews.title: The product is good..
customer_reviews.text: Savings was not as much as expected...about the same as I could get through a retail store. The product is good...
customer_reviews.author: Frank R. Laurie

customer_reviews.title: ... takes some getting used to but does give a good smooth shave after learning how to manipulate it
customer_reviews.text: This takes some getting used to but does give a good smooth shave after learning how to manipulate it. It could be made easier to use
customer_reviews.author: DAVID FINCLE

product_meta.title: Gillette Fusion ProGlide Men's Razor with Flexball Handle Technology + 1 Razor Blade Refill, Mens Razors/Blades
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Fusion Proglide (New Version)| Size:1 Razor, 1 CartridgeFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Gillette Fusion ProGlide Razor with FlexBall Technology, the men’s razor that responds to contours for Gillette’s best shave. Gillette's best razor blades are 2X preferred when used with the Fusion ProGlide Razor with FlexBall Handle Technology (overall preference vs. former ProGlide, among ProGlide users). Gillette Fusion ProGlide razor blades feature a precision beard trimmer for accurate edging. Reengineered Low Cutting Force razor blades feature thinner, finer blades (first four blades vs. Fusion) with advanced low-resistance coating to cut effortlessly through hair with less tug and pull than Fusion. A Blade Stabilizer maintains optimal razor blade spacing for comfort, while allowing the razor blades to respond to the contours of a man’s face. Plus, the Streamlined Comfort Guard channels excess shaving cream to produce optimal blade contact, stretching the skin for a close, comfortable shave. And the razor’s Enhanced Lubrastrip (vs. MACH3) is infused with mineral oil and lubricating polymers that allow the Gillette Fusion ProGlide razor blade to move smoothly over skin, even on repeat strokes.
feature_bullets: Gillette Fusion ProGlide Power Manual Men's Razor with FlexBall Handle Technology
FlexBall Handle Technology responds to contours for Gillette's best shave
5 Blades the thinnest, finest blades for less tug and pull
Precision Trimmer on the back for accurate edging
All Fusion razor blades fit all Fusion handles
